sense.def:
To twist something
pomeni obrniti en konec nečesa v eno smer, drugi konec pa v drugo.

seg.quote: Never twist or wring woollen garments.
He gave one short twist to its neck.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
twists
, se premakne ali ukrivi v nenavadno obliko.

seg.quote: Her features twisted into a stare of disgusted incredulity.
Hundreds of people were trapped under the twisted steel girders.

sense.def:
To twist
pomeni tudi premikati se v krožni smeri.

seg.quote: She twisted round on the couch to watch him.

sense.def:
To twist one's ankle or wrist
pomeni gleženj ali zapestje premočno premakniti ali premakniti v nenavadno smer in ga tako poškodovati.

Kadar cesta ali reka
twists
, ima veliko ostrih zavojev.

seg.quote: The road began to twist up past the lower slopes of a pine forest.

sense.def:
To twist what someone has said
pomeni ponoviti besede nekoga drugega tako, da spremenimo njihov pomen.

A twist
je oblika nečesa, kar je ukrivljeno ali zvilo.

A twist in a story or film
je nepričakovan potek dogodkov v zgodbi ali filmu.

seg.quote: There was an odd twist to the plot.

sense.def:
To twist someone's arm
pomeni nekoga prepričati, da nekaj naredi;

To twist someone round one's little finger
pomeni imeti tak vpliv na nekoga, da ga lahko prepričamo, da naredi karkoli;
